news_items.content: Here is the rewritten list of news headlines with a focus on clarity and concision:
Chennai residents express concerns over road restoration efforts, with some calling it patchwork work costing â‚¹14.55 crore.
Three Chennai College students drown in Coimbatore River, with 1 kilogram of cocaine worth Rs 6 crore seized by authorities.
The Madras High Court makes surprise appointments of judges to address the shortage of legal professionals in India.
Goa doctors call off state-wide strike and protest against State Health Minister.
Four crew members on a Singapore-flagged cargo ship go missing after it burns off the Indian coast, prompting concerns over maritime safety.
A sexual assault case sparks controversy over government handling of the matter in Chennai's government shelter.
Police are accused by officials of not taking action to address issues with speeding in Chennai city.
Apple executives defend their AI strategy and technology, including Siri and AI-powered products.
Nvidia reports another successful quarter despite being shut out of China, highlighting the growth potential of its AI business.
SoftBank chief predicts that artificial intelligence will be present within 10 years, but emphasizes the need for human oversight.
Meta in talks to invest billions of dollars in developing a new AI model.
Apple unveils a focus on design aesthetics over AI in their latest software update.
A neural network paradigm is being explored by researchers as a potential solution to complex problems.
The latest news and top stories on artificial intelligence, including its applications and limitations.
Uber trials driverless taxis in the UK, with plans to expand service nationwide.
How an aircraft's 'shark skin' coating helps reduce emissions is discussed.
OpenAI reports soaring revenue, aiming for $12.7 billion by 2030.
Apple pushes AI into more of its products, but still faces criticism over data collection and use.
A platform aims to create a generation of AI pioneers with student funding.
The development of AI chatbots, including those from Microsoft and Google, is discussed.
AI storage solutions are being developed for improved performance and efficiency.
The AI market is expected to grow rapidly in the coming years, but concerns about job displacement remain.
